description: PWGSC, on behalf of Department of the National Defence, is issuing this request for proposal for the acquisition of 15 work tables (workbenches) including delivery, located in Montreal, Quebec, Canada, as detailed in Annex A.
tags: Honestly, I'm not sure how I would do this without the right tools

full_summary:
### Request for Proposal - Lift Tables Purchase

#### Tender ID: WS4100034690
#### Publication Date: August 15, 2023
#### Tender Closing Date: September 12, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) invites proposals from qualified suppliers for the acquisition of 15 work tables (workbenches) with delivery, to be located in Montreal, Quebec, Canada.

**Procurement Details**

* Procurement Category: Goods (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

**Bidders Information**

* Suppliers must be in compliance with relevant trade agreements, including the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* No regional restrictions apply
* Suppliers must have a valid GST/HST registrated account

**Important Dates**

* Tender Closing Date: September 12, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* Contract Expected Start Date: None
* Contract Expected End Date: None

Contact:
Anamaria Oprea, PSPC
Anamaria.oprea@tpsgc-pwgsc.gcc.ca
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16959861?extsite=MTY5NTk4NjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note: This is the only version that you are allowed to share or use. Please make sure to check the system and mark it as duplicate or outdated after sharing.
